descriptionHtml:
READ FIRST!!
For those who like compact storage rooms instead of multipurpose utility rooms.

The general idea was inspired by Korsakoffs the secret room of Breezehome. The basic premise is the same except I\'ve added a library and a larger storage room intended for trophies and ingot display.

The area contains the following:

14 bookshelves 
5 mannequins
8 tabletop bookshelves acting as storage for metal ingots
34 weapon racks
12 dagger displays
5 weapon displays
8 shield plaques
1 weapon plaque
An enchanter and an alchemy table
2 chests

Note: the shelves for the ingots should be used with unlimited bookshelves addon
Note 2: make a special save before using just in case if there are any bugs I haven\'t fixed
Note 3: might conflict with the secret room entrance as i\'ve placed the trapdoor in a similar location

IMPORTANT
Version 1.9.1.D.H. is for users with Dawnguard and Hearthfire, if playing a vanilla version of skyrim without dlcs ver 1.9.1 or earlier will suffice, no need to update.
Deleted duplicate navmeshes in Breezehome and the basement, if problems occour report them.
VERSION 2.0 requires dawnguard and heartfire, also the beta version of the latest patch was used.

Also >>REMOVE STUFF BEFORE UPDATING<< as items might disappear if updating to newer versions
author: magzor

files.name: Another Breezehome Basement
files.changelogHtml: Modified the navmesh which should prevent the mannequins from moving (too much), tested it a few times traveling around and it seems the mannequins stay put, thanks to plaguelas from skyrim nexus for the tip

files.name: Another Breezehome Basement
files.changelogHtml:
Added two more zones, the arboretum and the spiral library copied from the spire sans the lower floor bookshelves as they were unnecessary and a drag on resources
Removed some redundant lights in the mannequin room and changed the lighting of the room a bit
2 more weapon plaques and another dagger board!!!! -.-
